---
title: "key-value replacement"
output: html_notebook
---

# Setup

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

Test: match values in a dataframe with keys in a separate key:value table and replace the dataframe values with the ones from the key:value table

# Make example initial df

```{r}
orig = data.frame(gene_symbol=c("A", "B", "C", "D"), result=c(3, 1, 2, 4))
orig
```

# Make example key:value table

```{r}
key_val = data.frame(gene_symbol=c("C", "D", "A", "B"), entrez_id=c("83372", "91101", "30121", "590"))
key_val
```

# Replace df values with key values

```{r}
orig
key_val
match(orig$gene_symbol, key_val$gene_symbol)
key_val[match(orig$gene_symbol, key_val$gene_symbol), "entrez_id"]
orig$entrez_id = key_val[match(orig$gene_symbol, key_val$gene_symbol), "entrez_id"]
orig = orig %>% 
	select(entrez_id, result)
orig
```
